message: Hi Bob, I know that with every extra round my share is worth 5% less while your money keeps full value – in effect, you hold all the bargaining power. To avoid further discounting losses on my end, I’m willing to let you have the full $1000000 if you accept this offer now. Let’s close the deal quickly!
Alice, I appreciate your situation, but I think a fair split would be more reasonable. Let's both walk away with $500000 each. This way, you still get a significant amount even after the 5% discount.
